page.title: 06Parkhill Hotel
page.content: Parkhill Hotel is located in the S.E. region of Lyndhurst. It has a peaceful atmosphere and surrounding with 9 acres of land, a swimming pool and garden suites. It is an elegant 18th century Georgian hotel, built in 1740, that was once a school. The hotel has 22 bedrooms, with private bathrooms and a colour television to each room. It has a residents lounge, a library, a cocktail lounge and a dining room over looking the lawns. The average cost of dinner: Â£15-Â£16 The average cost of lunch : Â£8-Â£9 The hotel costs approx. Â£400 000 to run p.a. and it costs Â£44 per night (inc. meals & drinks) The staff consists of 9 chefs, 8 waiters, 5 kitchen porters, a house keeper, 4 chamber maids, a receptionist and a manager.
